meanings.definition: A mixture of equal amounts of two enantiomers
meanings.sent1: In the lab, the scientist created a racemate by combining two enantiomers in equal proportions.
meanings.sent2: The racemate formed when the left-handed and right-handed molecules were mixed together.
meanings.sent3: The racemate walked into the party with both enantiomers, making everyone do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a racemate of conflicting thoughts, unable to decide which enantiomer to follow.
meanings.sent5: The racemate of flavors in the dish created a perfect balance of taste.
